```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(jsonlite)
library(formattable)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
# read metadata from json
json <- fromJSON(system.file("extdata", "etn_fields.json", package = "etn"))
etn_fields <- data.frame(json)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
# rearrange and rename
etn_fields <-
  etn_fields %>%
  arrange(field_name) %>%
  rename(definition = name)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
formattable(
  etn_fields,
  align = c("l","l")
)
```
